message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth more than that to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I appreciate your interest but $900,000 is simply too low.  I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $1,050,000? This price reflects the value of the product and still gives you a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,050,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I understand your position, but $950,000 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,000,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. If you're serious about buying, I believe this is our final offer.
